name: Sweet Tarts & Pies
description:
With this worksop, dive into the details of creating delicious tarts and pies. Learn the techniques to perfect your ‘sablée’ dough, lining of the shells and tricks to making a lattice top!
• Banana Caramel Hazelnut Tart
• Dark Chocolate & Berry Tart
• Apple Ginger Cinnamon Pie
• Pecan Pie

name: Mediterranean Delights (LBS)
description:
Enjoy a flavourful journey through the Mediterranean while learning the classic pita-hummus, fetayer, and iconic baklava.
• Pita (with classic Hummus & Baba ganoush)
• Fetayer
• Baklava

name: 2-day Figurine Modelling Class
description: 2-day hands-on class that deep dives into making figurines for cake decoration, including 2 human models in sitting and standing positions, and 3 animal models with various cute expressions; the class aims to equip both hobbyists and professionals with new techniques and processes to create new designs.

name: Royal Icing Cookies
description: 1-day hands-on class in the creation of decorative royal icing cookies, including making and shaping the cookie using minimal tools, flooding areas with icing, and adding details for a beautiful professional look.

name: Cupcakes, Cookies & Muffins
description:
A perfectly frosted cupcake could fix all our problems! This workshop will take you through all the recipes and techniques to make decadent cupcakes, creamy frostings, fudgy cookies and more. Understand how to create the best cookie doughs and muffin batters that give you the best texture.
• Chocolate Cupcake
• Red Velvet Cupcake
• Vanilla Caramel Cupcake
• Apple Oats Muffin
• Double Chocolate Chip Cookie
• Oatmeal Cranberry Cookie
• Lemon Crinkle Cookie

name: Classic Pies (LBS)
description:
Master the art of crafting, lining & filling pies that are both delicious & visually stunning, including the Classic Apple Pie & Banoffee Pie.
• Apple Pie
• Banoffee Pie

name: Breakfast Pastries
description:
Learn the art of lamination & beauty of having layers of butter & dough coming together to form the best version of a flakey, buttery & scrumptious pastry with a variety of fillings & looks, taking it up a notch!
• Classic Croissant
• Chocolate Croissant
• Almond Croissant
• Almond Marzipan
• Cinnamon Roll (Cinnamon Roll Mix)
• Fruit Danish
• Almond Cream & Pastry Cream

name: Entremets
description:
This between-the-layers workshop is all about constructing perfect entremets with different textures! Along with the right recipes and balanced ratios, you will also learn the glazing, garnishing and finishing techniques to make your entremets look the most exquisite!
• Coffee & Hazelnut Moelleux
• Coffee Cremeux
• Hazelnut Praline Crunch
• Milk Chocolate Coffee Mousse
• Banana Sponge
• Exotic Fruit Compote
• Passion Cremeux
• Caramelized White Chocolate Mousse
• Mirror Glaze

name: All About Cheesecakes
description:
Learn the art of baking the creamiest cheesecakes with a burst of flavours, elements so classy & decadent you’ll never say no to eating a slice! Understanding how to make both bake and no-bake cheesecakes, flavour them, & make them look gorgeous!
• Basque Cheesecake
• Mango Passionfruit No-bake Cheesecake (with Mango Passion Gel)
• Chocolate Cheesecake
• Eggless Caramel Pecan Cheesecake

name: Puff Pastry & Choux
description:
A session of classical french pastries – for Puff, a showcasing of hand lamination, achieving a flakey, buttery pastry with a sweet & savoury filling to add on to the deliciousness. For Choux, the beauty of making, piping & baking choux buns & good old eclairs alongside flavors of creme patissiere.
• Savoury puff
• Apple turnovers
• Chocolate Profiteroles with chocolate pastry cream and Chocolate Namelaka
• Mango Eclair with mango pastry cream with Vanilla Namelaka

name: Enriched Breads
description:
From the classic sugar glazed donut to the most extravagant brioche! This workshop focuses on the techniques to create and work doughs with high fat content a.k.a enriched doughs! Learn to perfect your donut rings and make a bunch of delicious fillings to take your breads to the next level!
• Classic Glazed
• Cinnamon Sugar
• Coffee Cocoa
• Peanut Butter Jelly
• Vanilla Blueberry
• Berry Jam
• Brioche à Tête
• Mascarpone-filled

name: Basics in Bread
description:
Learn how to make easy but delicious breads & understand the basic fundamentals of bread making, from selecting the right flour to proofing and baking of bread. This workshop is perfect for someone with very little or no experience in baking. These varieties of breads are great options for your day-to-day baking.
• Soft rolls
• Ladi Pav
• Sandwich Loaf
• Burger Bun
• Grissini

name: Eggless Baking
description:
This workshop is specially designed to equip you with the understanding of eggless baking! Apart from learning recipes, you will be taught the concepts of finding suitable eggless substitutes!
• Peanut Butter Cookie
• Lime & Coconut Tart
• Dark Chocolate Cupcake
• Blondie
• Chocolate Jaggery & Whole Wheat Loaf

name: Basics in Chocolate
description:
Who doesn’t love a piece of chocolate? Learn the science & techniques of ‘tempering’ couverture chocolate to attain the shiniest of ‘bonbons’, decadent truffles & delicious ganache fillings.
• Truffles (3 types)
• Bonbons (4 types)

name: Teatime Cakes
description:
This workshop focuses on recreating some of the classic tea time cakes! Learn the recipes and techniques to take these cakes to the next level. Also discover the ways to make these cakes travel well and last longer.
• Classic Lemon Tea Cake
• Devil’s Chocolate Cake
• Marble Cake
• Carrot Cake
• Banana Bread

name: Savoury Bakes
description:
Step into the ‘hot’ side of our kitchen where we’ll be making a variety of savory products like tarts, quiches and bagels! Dive into the techniques of working with shortcrust pastry and baking perfect bagels!
• Mushroom Thyme & Spinach Tart
• Oriental Chicken Tart
• Caramelized Onions & Feta Cheese Tart
• Calzone
• Jerusalem Bagels

name: Baked Desserts
description:
Learn recipes and techniques to achieve silky custards & decadent puddings, all baked to the most perfect texture every single time. You’ll also be making the classic cheesecake, and an ooey-gooey crowd pleaser, the choco lava cake!
• Classic New York Cheesecake
• Crème Caramel
• Bread & Butter Pudding
• Choco Lava Cake
• Crème Brûlée

name: World Breads
description:
Travel around the world on the bread-plane! Learn the techniques to make a variety of bread from different countries! Stepping up your bread game by making baguettes and focaccia! Understand how to make and use pre-ferments to improve the flavor and texture of your breads.
• Baguette
• Focaccia
• Whole Wheat Orange Loaf
• Cinnabon
• Korean Garlic Bread
